documentation.text:
@notice Emitted when the `user` of an NFT or the `expires` of the `user` is changed
 The zero address for user indicates that there is no user address

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC721: transfer caller is not owner nor approved"

arguments.value: ERC721: transfer caller is not owner nor approved

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC721: transfer caller is not owner nor approved"

@notice Emitted when the `user` of an NFT or the `expires` of the `user` is changed
 The zero address for user indicates that there is no user address

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC721: transfer caller is not owner nor approved"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC721: transfer caller is not owner nor approved"

setUser(uint256,address,uint64).details: The zero address indicates there is no user Throws if `tokenId` is not valid NFT

params.expires: UNIX timestamp, The new user could use the NFT before expires
params.user: The new user of the NFT

userExpires(uint256).details: The zero value indicates that there is no user

params.tokenId: The NFT to get the user expires for

returns._0: The user expires for this NFT

userOf(uint256).details: The zero address indicates that there is no user or the user is expired

params.tokenId: The NFT to get the user address for

returns._0: The user address for this NFT

UpdateUser(uint256,address,uint64).notice: Emitted when the `user` of an NFT or the `expires` of the `user` is changed The zero address for user indicates that there is no user address

setUser(uint256,address,uint64).notice: set the user and expires of a NFT

userExpires(uint256).notice: Get the user expires of an NFT

userOf(uint256).notice: Get the user address of an NFT
